page.title: 13St Peter & St Paul's. C of E
page.content: Ellesborough Church is about 3.75 km. from Wendover. The Church has had 48 Rectors.Part of the church is dated from the 11th. Century. The stained glass windows are about 300 years old. The church has had lots of famous political people attend it,including the Vice-Presedent George Bush and his wife, Margaret Thatcher, Edward Heath, and his wife, Sir Alex Douglas-Hume, Eisenhower, and many others. There are 419 graves and the youngest person buried was 4 months old. The first rector was Thomas De Bardeney,1223, and the present Rector is Mr.D.Horner who has been Rector for 9 years. It is the nearest church to Chequers the Priminister's country house.
